title: Create Your Lana NOSTR Profile
description: Complete your profile information to create a KIND 0 NOSTR event

placeholders.name: Your full name
placeholders.statementOfResponsibility: Write in your own words that you accept unconditional self-responsibility inside the Lana World...

help.lanoshi2lash: 1 Lana equals 100,000,000 Lanoshi. A Lash is like giving someone a token of appreciation. We recommend setting 1 Lash = 100 Lanoshi at the beginning.
help.banking: If you decide to sell some of your Lanas or Lanoshis, please provide your payment details so others know where to send the money.
help.privateKey: Hey Man, just a reminder ‚Äî your Private Key is never stored anywhere. If you lose it, you lose both your identity and your Lana forever.
help.statementOfResponsibility: Write in your own words that you accept unconditional self-responsibility inside the Lana World.

validation.whoAreYouRequired: Please specify if you are Human or AI
validation.statementTooShort: Statement must be at least 10 characters

selfResponsibility.rule: Lana World has only one rule: Everyone is unconditionally self-responsible.
selfResponsibility.explanation: That simply means that if, for any reason, you fail to accept this responsibility, all your wallets will be unregistered.
selfResponsibility.power: All the power is always in your hands.

gameEnd.earnedDescription: You earned 1 LanaCoin that is going to become Worth 100 Million
gameEnd.keepPrivateKeySafe: Keep your private key safe - you'll need it to access your wallet
gameEnd.privateKeyWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Keep this private key secure! Anyone with this key can access your wallet.
gameEnd.skipDescription: Create your wallet directly without earning the LanaCoin prize

privateKeyVerification.title: Private Key Verification
privateKeyVerification.description: Now let's test how serious you are about your Private Key. If you saved it properly, you should have it right now. üôÇ
privateKeyVerification.lostKey: I lost it. Take me back to the game.
privateKeyVerification.incorrectKey: This is not the proper private key.

notifications.walletCreatedDesc: Your LanaCoin wallet has been generated successfully.
notifications.walletRegeneratedDesc: A new LanaCoin wallet has been generated.
notifications.noWalletDataDesc: No wallet data available. Please generate a wallet first.
notifications.cryptoLibraryError: Cryptographic libraries are still loading. Please refresh the page and try again.
notifications.invalidFileDesc: Please select a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, WEBP) under 5MB
notifications.imageUploadedDesc: Your profile picture has been uploaded and compressed
notifications.uploadFailedDesc: Failed to upload image. Please try again.
